lead_paragraph: Hummingbirds have forked tongues that spring open once inserted into a flower acting like a pump to draw out nectar.

headline.main: The Hummingbird’s Tongue: How It Works
headline.print_headline: The Marvelous Mechanics of the Hummingbird’s Tongue
